title: "Jaywing acquires Midisi, owner of its artificial intelligence software"
excerpt: "Jaywing PLC on Friday said it has bought marketing software development firm Midisi Ltd, which owns the intellectual property rights for Jaywing's artificial intelligence software Decision. Jaywing is a Sheffield-based data-driven advertising and marketing agency."
